summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OhCampus Counselor Platform NEW FEATURES (iteration 3). All backend APIs passed (26/26 tests). Frontend features working correctly including multi-select filters, compare mode, admission alerts, bulk fee creation, and CSV import.
passed_tests: Backend: Authentication - Admin and Counselor login (2 tests)
Backend: Filters endpoint returns states, cities, categories, AND courses for multi-select (4 tests)
Backend: Colleges filtering by state, city, category, course (4 tests)
Backend: Admission alerts - colleges with alerts have data, colleges without alerts have empty array (2 tests)
Backend: PUT /api/colleges/{id}/admission-alerts endpoint works correctly (3 tests)
Backend: POST /api/fees/bulk endpoint creates multiple fees at once (4 tests)
Backend: CSV template endpoint returns correct format (1 test)
Backend: CSV import requires auth and rejects non-CSV files (2 tests)
Backend: Compare colleges endpoint works for 2-4 colleges (4 tests)
Frontend: Multi-select filters with search functionality on dashboard
Frontend: Active filter badges display with clear (X) functionality
Frontend: Compare Mode button activates comparison mode
Frontend: Compare Mode banner shows selected colleges count (0/4 to 4/4)
Frontend: Compare Mode banner does NOT overlap with search bar
Frontend: College cards show alert badges (e.g., '2 Alerts', '1 Alert')
Frontend: College selection for comparison with checkmarks on cards
Frontend: Compare page shows side-by-side comparison with Highlights, Courses, Fee Range, Admission Charges
Frontend: College detail page (col-1 AIMS) shows admission alerts section
Frontend: College detail page (col-3 Alliance) does NOT show alerts section (empty alerts)
Frontend: Admin Fee Management page with college selector
Frontend: Admin 'Add All Year/Semester Fees' bulk fee dialog with period rows
Frontend: Admin 'Import CSV' dialog with Download Template and file upload
seed_data_creation: Database already seeded with 8 colleges, 22 courses. Colleges col-1, col-2, col-4, col-5, col-8 have admission alerts. Colleges col-3, col-6, col-7 have empty alerts arrays.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: 1) Multi-select filters with search on dashboard, 2) Compare mode with college selection and side-by-side comparison page, 3) Admission alerts showing on college detail pages (only for colleges with alerts), 4) Bulk fee creation endpoint /api/fees/bulk, 5) CSV import dialog on admin fee management page. Backend test file created at /app/backend/tests/test_new_features.py with 26 comprehensive tests.
